activities.loc: Branch 2 Courtroom, 2nd Floor, Oneida County Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Samantha A. Ward

records.addlTxt: Deferred Prosecution Agreement

4:15 PM Defendant Samantha A. Ward in court. Attorney Michael Hughes in court for Samantha A. Ward. Attorney Mary M Sowinski Ms. in court for State of Wisconsin. Calling 21CF213 & 22CF4. Deferred Prosecution Agreement/victim impact statement has been presented. Court has reviewed. Sowinski statement to agreement. State moves to amend count 1 in 22CF4 to a misdemeanor. Granted. State has complied with victim rights. State moves to dismiss 21CF213. Granted. Court accepts DPA  and amends bond to $1000 Signature Bond. adj. 04:23 PM
Review hearing scheduled for October 9, 2023 at 03:30 pm.
all conditions form cash bond remain

2:04 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Samantha A. Ward in court.  Attorney Brian F. Bennett in court for Samantha A. Ward. 10:31 AM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Samantha A. Ward in court. Attorney Brian F. Bennett in court for Samantha A. Ward. Calling 22CF4 & 21CF213. 22CF4 set for a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over. Pfeifer states Information will be filed that mirrors Complaint. Bennett willing to proceed to Arraignment today; waives further reading and enters not guilty pleas. Bond continued. adj. 10:34 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

3:21 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Samantha A. Ward does not appear, Attorney Brian F. Bennett for Samantha A. Ward appeared in court. Court states Defendant was in court earlier - not present now - Bennett allowed her to leave - will give Defendant next court date. Pfeifer statement to 22CF04 - needs to be set for a preliminary hearing. Court calls that case also. Bond continued. adj. 03:49 PM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
